p: Vero and COS (both from African green monkey kidney), BHK21 (baby hamster kidney), and IBRS-2 (pig kidney) cells were grown at 37Â°C in DMEM medium supplemented with 5 or 10% fetal calf serum. ASFV isolates, either from a field strain (E70) or a Vero cell-adapted strain (Ba71V), were grown in swine alveolar macrophages (E70) or in Vero cells and titrated on COS cell monolayers, as described ( Carrascosa et al., 2011). Type C FMDV C-S8 isolate ( Sobrino et al., 1983) and VSV Indiana ( Novella et al., 1996) virus stocks were grown in BHK21 cells, while type O FMDV 0-UKG 11/2001 (The Pirbright Institute, UK) and SVDV SP93 ( Borrego et al., 2002) viral stocks were produced in IBRS-2 cells.
